h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 11
content: At the base of the sand slope in Fright Cliff, you will see the Yellow Sand Formation \- Windseal Gate Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Instead of going through the gate with the Sterness of Stone and Keeness of Tiger, head up the path opposite the slope.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 11'.
The content is as follows:
At the base of the sand slope in Fright Cliff, you will see the Yellow Sand Formation \- Windseal Gate Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Instead of going through the gate with the Sterness of Stone and Keeness of Tiger, head up the path opposite the slope.
